article_title: U.S. Healthcare Spending On Track To Hit $10,000 Per Person This Year

article_metadata.author: Dan Munro

og.description: There's never a shortage of major healthcare policy events in any given calendar year ‒ and 2015 will be no exception. Here's a short list of some that are pending and noteworthy ‒ with a few predictions. First up isn't a prediction as much as a major milestone that's reflective of [...]
